TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PathClassLoader extends Dalvik.SystemInterop.BaseDexClassLoader

Docs.summary: Provides a simple implementation that operates on a list of files and directories in the local file system, but does not attempt to load classes from the network.

remarks.para: Provides a simple implementation that operates on a list of files and directories in the local file system, but does not attempt to load classes from the network. Android uses this class for its system class loader and for its application class loader(s).

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.

remarks.para: This constructor is invoked by the runtime infrastructure () to create a new managed representation for a Java Native Interface object.
The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dexPath, class Java.Lang.ClassLoader parent) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a PathClassLoader that operates on a given list of files and directories.

remarks.para: Creates a PathClassLoader that operates on a given list of files and directories. This method is equivalent to calling with a null value for the second argument (see description there).

MemberSignature.Value: public PathClassLoader (string dexPath, string libraryPath, Java.Lang.ClassLoader parent);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dexPath, string libraryPath, class Java.Lang.ClassLoader parent) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a PathClassLoader that operates on two given lists of files and directories.

remarks.para:
Creates a PathClassLoader that operates on two given lists of files and directories. The entries of the first list should be one of the following:
JAR/ZIP/APK files, possibly containing a "classes.dex" file as well as arbitrary resources.
Raw ".dex" files (not inside a zip file).
The entries of the second list should be directories containing native library files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string FindLibrary(string libname) cil managed

Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
